title: UR GAME SUCKS ASS
body: {{summoner:14}} So I was choosing my champion and guess what? my game bugs out and I have to wait 5 min..alright that's not bad but wait till I explain the rest. I COME ON A SECOND TIME AND I FUCKIN HAVE TO WAIT 14-15 MIN CUZ OF THAT BUG..ITS ANNOYING..FIX UR SHITTY GAME RIOT

replies.body:
You see that big warning on the login screen and the client homepage, alerting everyone to this bug and how to avoid it?

Obviously not..

Maybe when you have any experience with software engineering you can complain, but you have to be literate first.
